block.p: Dr. Katherine Kostakos and Nicholas James Fengos are to be married today by the Rev. Dr. Robert G. Stephanopoulos at the Greek Orthodox Archdiocesan Cathedral of the Holy Trinity in Manhattan.
Dr. Katherine Kostakos and Nicholas James Fengos are to be married today by the Rev. Dr. Robert G. Stephanopoulos at the Greek Orthodox Archdiocesan Cathedral of the Holy Trinity in Manhattan.

Dr. Kostakos, 34, is keeping her name. She is an internist at the Montefiore Medical Group, a clinic in Pelham, N.Y. She graduated from City College and New York Medical College. She is the daughter of Pauline and Nicholas Kostakos of Whitestone, Queens.

Mr. Fengos, 38, is the legal officer for human resources at the International Rescue Committee, the refugee relief organization, in Manhattan. Until last year, he was an assistant district attorney in Brooklyn. He graduated from New York University and received a law degree from Fordham. He is the son of Lola and James Fengos of Whitestone.
